articles.author: Carson Blackwelder
articles.title: Travis Barker's 'urgent family matter' sees Blink-182 postpone European tour dates - GMA
articles.description: Blink-182 is postponing European tour dates due to Travis Barker experiencing an "urgent family matter."
articles.content:
Blink-182 is postponing European tour dates due to an "urgent family matter" for drummer Travis Barker.
The band -- which also consists of members Mark Hoppus and Tom DeLonge -- issued a statement t… [+1071 chars]
